hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc rm -rf ./* export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
#Install dependencies sudo yum install -y git tar java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel wget which
#build maven 3.2.5 wget -q http://www.eu.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.2.5/binaries/apache-maven-3.2.5-bin.tar.gz tar -xzf apache-maven-3.2.5-bin.tar.gz export PATH=$PWD/apache-maven-3.2.5/bin:$PATH
#install IBM SDK for node js cd $WORK_DIR wget -q http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/6.13.0.0/linux/s390x/ibm-6.13.0.0-node-v6.13.0-linux-s390x.bin chmod +x ibm-6.13.0.0-node-v6.13.0-linux-s390x.bin echo -e "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=$WORK_DIR/ibm/node\n-fileOverwrite_$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/_node_installation/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties ./ibm-6.13.0.0-node-v6.13.0-linux-s390x.bin -f installer.properties -i silent export PATH=$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/bin:$PATH
#set environment variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Xmx4096m export JVM_ARGS="-Xms4096m -Xmx4096m" export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xms4096m -Xmx8192m -Xss4096k"
#Install rvm and nvm cd $HOME curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --autolibs=enabled && source $HOME/.profile command curl -sSL https://rvm.io/mpapis.asc | gpg2 --import - wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.26.1/install.sh | bash && source $HOME/.bashrc
#Download source cd $WORK_DIR git clone -q https://github.com/apache/storm.git cd storm git checkout tags/v1.1.1
#Increase nimbus-test timeout sed -i 's/while-timeout 5000/while-timeout 500000/g' storm-core/test/clj/org/apache/storm/nimbus_test.clj
#Build. Test skipped due to random intermittent failures. mvn -B clean install -DskipTests
#generate gpg key echo "Key-Type: 1 Key-Length: 2048 Subkey-Type: 1 Subkey-Length: 2048 Name-Real: Root Superuser Name-Email: root@handbook.westarete.com Expire-Date: 0" > gen-key-script gpg --batch --gen-key gen-key-script
#create binary distribution cd storm-dist/binary && mvn -B package
